snippet.title: Pre-order Now — The Company of Heroes Collection Lands October 12th on Nintendo Switch!
snippet.description:
D-Day is coming— The Company of Heroes Collection lands on Nintendo Switch on October 12th.

The real-time strategy classic makes its console debut, including all the added factions, units and campaigns of the Opposing Fronts and Tales of Valor expansions! Master the challenging blend of fast-moving combat and squad-based tactics, and lead the charge with an all-new control scheme, custom-built for console commanders.

Pre-order via the Nintendo eShop now, and the first into the fray on release day: https://www.feralinteractive.com/switch-games/companyofheroescollection/eshop/

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/feralgames
Like us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/FeralInteractive

#NintendoSwitch #CompanyOfHeroes #RealTimeStrategy
